name: Neolocity
description:
In Neolocity, you play as Zero in an open-world 3D action-adventure game set in a city controlled by an oppressive government. Use combat and parkour skills to complete missions and take down the government. Luckily, Zero is equipped with an umbrella that can be used to fight the government patrol robots, glide from rooftops, and perform powerful boost jumps to reach high places.

Ontario Tech University Game Dev Workshop Year 3 Final Project

Developed By: The Hopeful Goats
